title: ‘Unrestrained’ Chinese Cyberattackers May Have Stolen Data From Almost Every American
description: Information collected during the yearslong  Salt Typhoon attack could allow Beijing’s intelligence services to track targets from the United States and dozens of other countries.
body: Information collected during the yearslong  Salt Typhoon attack could allow Beijing’s intelligence services to track targets from the United States and dozens of other countries.

title: Europe Aims to Show It Is Ready to Secure Postwar Ukraine
description: President Emmanuel Macron of France is hosting a meeting of leaders who will review options for protecting any peace with Russia.
body: President Emmanuel Macron of France is hosting a meeting of leaders who will review options for protecting any peace with Russia.

title: Portugal Searches for Cause of Funicular Crash That Killed at Least 16
description: The authorities were also working to identify the victims, which a local official said included some foreigners. The funicular is popular with tourists.
body: The authorities were also working to identify the victims, which a local official said included some foreigners. The funicular is popular with tourists.

title: After Trump Comments, Hamas Says It’s Ready for Deal on All Hostages
description: The Palestinian militant group has expressed similar positions in the past, and Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel dismissed its statement as “spin” and “nothing new.”
body: The Palestinian militant group has expressed similar positions in the past, and Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel dismissed its statement as “spin” and “nothing new.”

title: 2 Dead as Russia Strikes Danish Demining Group, Ukraine Official Says
description: The Danish Refugee Council said that one of its teams had been affected by a missile attack and that it was investigating.
body: The Danish Refugee Council said that one of its teams had been affected by a missile attack and that it was investigating.

title: With Door to U.N. Slammed Shut, Palestinians Urge U.S. to Drop Visa Ban
description: When world leaders meet in New York this month, several plan to recognize a Palestinian state, but Palestinian leaders may not be there to revel in the moment.
body: When world leaders meet in New York this month, several plan to recognize a Palestinian state, but Palestinian leaders may not be there to revel in the moment.

title: Russia Wants ‘Security Guarantees’ Too. Here’s What They Look Like.
description: The Kremlin’s vision of national security comes at the expense of Ukrainian sovereignty, underlining the challenges of striking a peace deal.
body: The Kremlin’s vision of national security comes at the expense of Ukrainian sovereignty, underlining the challenges of striking a peace deal.
